entry.dcterms:title: ISSP 1986 Social Networks and Support Systems I. Irish data.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-B06: ISSP 1986 Social Networks and Support Systems I. Irish data.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Ward, Conor
Whelan, Brendan
entry.dcterms:contributor: Central Archive for Empirical Social Research
entry.dcterms:description: family ties with mother, father living apart, brothers and sisters, adult children living separately; family status, relation with grandparents, other relatives, contacts with relatives outside the nuclear family, ties with friends, people next door; questions concerning supports; data on the respondent's place of residence, home, occupation, sector of his/her job, membership in social organizations, respondent's demographic, income and religious data, data on his/her spouse and father

social behaviour and attitudes
housing

family life, marriage, relationship
equality and inequality

person
survey data
cross-section
The sample is representative of the population aged 18 and over.
face-to-face interview
B
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: TDATA-B75
TDATA-C93
TDATA-B07
TDATA-E82
TDATA-F44

The 1986 (Social Networks) and the 1987 (Social Inequality I) ISSP modules have been conducted together with the 1989 ISSP module on ‘Work Orientations' (ZA No. 1840). The Irish data for the 1989 ISSP module are in the international file. ZA Study no.: 1
SPSS portable datafile
